message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.CC 

The paper deals with source coding and side information, which are typically studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. The use of a vending machine to control the acquisition of side information is a novel concept that could also be relevant to the networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) and signal processing (cs.SI) sub-categories. Finally, the paper also discusses the design of optimal coding strategies, which is a topic that falls under the category of computational complexity (cs.CC).
